basic.floral_language:
Tulipa gesneriana
Floriography:Intelligent, warm and thoughtful 
Tulip, as the national flower for the flower kingdom of the Netherlands and several other countries, is the “queen of flowers in the world”. 
Tulips have tall and strong stems, and the flower colors are beautiful. With the wine glass shape, the flowers are very elegant. When you are in the tulip flower field, you will extrapolate and obtain spiritual joy. 
Tulips like the sun light, they are blooming in early spring, lasting for 3-4 weeks. Keep the bulbs for germination in the coming year, under normal circumstances it can bloom every year
basic.blooming: Flowering period March-May, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.sunlight: Long-day plant, put in sunny places, but avoid strong sunlight at noon
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly only when soil is dry, reduce watering during flowering season, 1-2 times a week
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove the withered parts on the ground after flowering, leaving bulbs for germination in the next year
